languages.text: The character can move to any cell within their line of sight in a 2-cell radius around the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
languages.original_text: Персонаж может переместиться на любую клетку в зоне видимости в радиусе 2 клеток от {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангарда{/g}, не спровоцировав {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The character can move to any cell adjacent to the Vanguard without provoking attacks of opportunity.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж может переместиться на любую клетку, смежную с позицией авангарда, не спровоцировав атаки по возможности.
Персонаж может переместиться на любую клетку, смежную с позицией авангарда, не спровоцировав атаки по возможности.

languages.text: 该盟友可以移动到{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}身边2格之内，视线范围内的任意格子处，此次移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 该盟友可以移动到{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}身边2格之内，视线范围内的任意格子处，此次移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。

languages.text: El personaje puede moverse a cualquier casilla en su línea de visión en un radio de 2 casillas del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.
languages.original_text: The character can move to any cell within their line of sight in a 2-cell radius around the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El personaje puede moverse a cualquier casilla en su línea de visión en un radio de 2 casillas del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.

languages.text: Der Charakter kann sich auf ein beliebiges Feld in Sichtweite in einem Radius von 2 Feldern um die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} bewegen, ohne {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren.

traits.locale_text: Der Charakter kann sich auf ein beliebiges Feld in Sichtweite in einem Radius von 2 Feldern um die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} bewegen, ohne {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren.

languages.text: Le personnage peut se déplacer sur n'importe quelle case dans son champ de vision et dans un rayon de 2  cases autour du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleur{/g} sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.
languages.original_text: The character can move to any cell within their line of sight in a 2-cell radius around the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le personnage peut se déplacer sur n'importe quelle case dans son champ de vision et dans un rayon de 2  cases autour du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleur{/g} sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発することなく、視界内の{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}の周囲2セル以内にへ移動できる。

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発することなく、視界内の{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}の周囲2セル以内にへ移動できる。

languages.text: Karakter, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemeden görüş hattı içinde bulunan ve {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Öncü{/g}'ye en fazla 2 hücre uzaklıktaki herhangi bir hücreye hareket edebilir.
